name: The Changing Room
description:
You are trapped in a room and you have to escape! There is a button in the room and when you press it the room changes!

Controls!

> : Right

< : Left

^ : Up

v : Down

Attack : Space

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0L5Rz3lGX6g

I made this for the 37th #ludumdare
